channel.title: [PI]Disconnects If You Go Up/Down A Floor?[PI]
channel.description: On my PI base, if you go up or down a floor (Example: Slayer Tower. If you click on stairs.) the client is nulled and you have to close it and open a new one. I cannot understand why this is happening. Can anybody help me?

item.title: [PI]Disconnects If You Go Up/Down A Floor?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

Although I had to figure this out about 2 months ago by myself I have repped you rawbie, thx for helping the community

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Disconnects If You Go Up/Down A Floor?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @rawbie rawbie
item.description:
@rawbie wrote:

Step 1 - Open up Client.java and Search for:

Step 2 - Replace it with

If the above didnâ€™t work

Step 3 - Replace this in run.bat

@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ START javaw -Xmx1500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
Step 4 - With this

Quote: @echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ START javaw -Xmx1500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 exit
Compile and Run your client and it should run 100%
